message: I propose dividing the money in an 80/20 ratio. I believe this is fair considering the risk and value each of us brings to the table.
I think a 60/40 split is a more reasonable proposal, considering the value I bring to the table.
Considering the inflation and Bob's contribution, I propose a 72/28 split. This maintains a fair balance while adjusting for the decrease in the value of the money.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I think 45/55 is a more reasonable split considering the current value of the money.
